nodes.text: Star Wars: The Force Awakens: Head-to-Head

Star Wars: The Force Awakens: Head-to-Head is a young-readers book that pits some of the characters and species from the Star Wars universe, more specifically ones from Star Wars Episode VII: The Force Awakens, against each other in thirty imaginary "face-off" fights to determine the superior combatant. The book is focused toward readers ages 9-12.
